intro: Batanthes, commonly known as the batanthes plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive, palmate leaves and showy, often brightly colored flowers. The plant is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and Asia. It typically grows in moist, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun to partial shade. Batanthes species are often cultivated for their ornamental value due to their attractive foliage and blooms.
